The Service uses cookies and similar technologies such as pixel tags and web beacons (collectively, "Cookies") to enable our servers to recognize your web browser, tell us how and when you visit and use our Service, analyze trends, learn about our user base and operate and improve our Service.

We may also collect information about you from our service providers, and information from third parties such as advertising networks, analytics providers, and search information providers.

This Privacy Policy ("Privacy Policy") applies to the Torch Software-as-a-Service platform, our website (available at https://www.torch.io , "Website"), the Torch Community, and the related applications provided by Torch ( https://app.torch.io , the "Service") and explains how Redfish Labs, Inc. dba Torch Leadership Labs ("Torch," "we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, shares and otherwise processes "Personal Information."
To help us provide the Torch Service, we do share Personal Information with sub-processors, companies which provide specialized services we use within the Torch platform.
We retain Personal Information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected including contractual, legal, accounting, or reporting requirements.
We will grant a request to delete personal information as required by law, but you should note that in many situations we must keep certain Personal Information to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, enforce our agreements, or for other required business or legal purposes.

We may collect information about how you use our Service or Website, such as the types of content you view or engage with, and the frequency and duration of your activities, or where you are inquiring information from.
